name: avan301 MEDIA 328 Creative
description:
This is a small game made for MEDIA 328: Video Games - Theory and Culture during Semester 2 2020 at University of Auckland.  It's also the first game I've made in Godot.

Directions:Arrow Keys to Move
X to Sprint
M to Mute Music

I followed the video series "Godot 3.0 Zelda-like Tutorial"by fornclake, where the majority of the code comes from, as well as the Player and Enemy sprites.  The code for the run & mute buttons, main menu, sound, and debugging was done by me.
Hit sound is by LittleRobotSoundFactory from Freesound.
Environment textures are from here and here.
Background music is my own.
